alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 6:20PM PST until January 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SUNDAY TO 4 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 15 to 30 inches. Gusty south to southwest winds of 40 to 55 mph may cause white-out conditions at times. * WHERE...In Washington, South Washington Cascades. In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 4 PM Sunday to 4 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very hazardous. Gusty winds will cause blowing snow and near zero visibility at times. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Keep an eye on the forecast for updates on the situation. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Slow down and allow extra time when travelling. Practice your winter safety rules. Keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your car in case of emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
